channel.title: Changing the world language a bot? - Free Code?
channel.description:
good people, my doubt is as follows. How do I open a PowerBot, and it can change the language, for example, with that instead of opening in the International English server, open the server he German, French or Brazilian!
Give me a hint how to open the code of PowerBot or other.

item.title: Changing the world language a bot? - Free Code?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I would suggest looking on their support forums for solving a problem like this. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the world language a bot? - Free Code?

item.title: Changing the world language a bot? - Free Code?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

hint: no.

the bot in question has been programmed for english only, a language adaptation for the bot would be needed (I don’t know why bots don’t have language data files assigned with them and the static strings initialised on load) in order to bot on the different language servers.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the world language a bot? - Free Code?
